text: neohuiga jeonjaeng-eseo bulsinjaleul mannass-eul ttae geudeul-ui mogdeul-eul ttaelila neohuiga wanjeonhi geudeul-eul jeabhaess-eul ttae geudeul-eul pololo chwihago geuhu eunhyelosseo seogbang-eul hadeonji animyeon jeonjaeng-i jongsigdoel ttaekkaji geudeul-eul bo sang-geum-eulo sogjoehayeo jula geuleohge hala neohuiege myeonglyeong-i iss-eossnola hananimkkeseo wonhasyeossdamyeon geudeul-ege eungbeol-eul naelyeoss-eul geos-ila geuleona geu bun-eun neohuilo hayeogeum seongjeonhadolog hayeoss-euni ilo hayeo neohuileul daleun jadeul-e biyuhayeo siheomkoja hasim-ila geuleona hananim-ui gil-eseo salhae doen ja issdamyeon geubun-eun geuui haeng-wigagyeolko sonsildoeji anhge hasil geos-ila
